TITLE.P: Adult Residential and Nursing Care Homes LTR Framework

SHORT_DESCR.P: Norfolk County Council wishes to procure the provision of adult residential care and nursing homes. All Adult residential and nursing care home providers are encouraged to apply, including those that the Council currently does business with. The value quoted is an estimate only and is dependent on future need of clients in Norfolk. The initial date for applications is given, however, this Framework Agreement will remain open to applicants throughout its term. We wish to explore working in partnership with approved providers to develop and enhance the services provided to people of Norfolk.

TITLE.P: Older Persons Residential and Nursing Care Homes

SHORT_DESCR.P: Residential and Nursing Care Homes for older persons.

INFO_ADD.P: The amount quoted is based on an estimate and is subject to change over the life of the framework as it is dependent on service user need.

INFO_ADD.P: The framework agreement differs from those let under the non light touch regime in that the Council, exercising its flexibility, may let the framework agreements for longer than 4 years and may keep the framework open for new applicants and/or new lots. The Council has let a Light.

Touch Regime Framework Agreements under Regulations 74 to 77 of the Public Contract Regulations 2015 (Light Touch Regime), under which the Council has flexibility as to the process or procedure to be used when purchasing certain services of which this is one.
